summary: This appears to be an email or communication from August 10, 2019, regarding documentation in possession about Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his inmate registration number and the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document is brief and seems to be transmitting information about Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the communication, identified by his inmate registration number 73618-054, with documentation referenced about him.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: The Metropolitan Correctional Center where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, which is the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
It references Epstein's inmate registration number: 73618-054.
It indicates the sender has documentation in their possession regarding Epstein.
It lists the address of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The document's creation date suggests it is related to post-mortem information gathering or communication about Epstein.
